title: Email Password Change
body: So I forgot my email address and I want to change my password. What do I do?

replies.body: We can help out with updating your information if you don't have access to your email.  Reach out to us in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help.  We'll reply back asap!
